General.Name: Madhav Marbles and Granites Limited
General.Description: Madhav Marbles and Granites Limited manufactures, processes, and trades in natural stones and tiles in India. The company's products include marble, granite, quartz, and sandstone, as well as calibrated and stone tiles. It sells its products to North America, South America, Canada, Europe, Australia, South Africa, Russia, and the Far East. The company is also involved in the windmill power generation and real estate businesses. Madhav Marbles and Granites Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Udaipur, India.
